recipes.title: Scrabble Brownies
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.  Beat in vanilla. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; add to the creamed mixture and mix well. Fold in nuts.                                                                                            Spread into a greased 15-in.  x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Bake at 350° for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool.                                                                                           Frost brownies with chocolate frosting. Cut into 1-1/2-in. squares. Place vanilla frosting in a small heavy-duty resealable plastic bag; cut an 1/8-in. hole in one corner. Pipe letters on brownies and arrange on a serving platter to form words.                                        Yield: 5 dozen.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Scrabble Brownies in  Quick CookingJanuary/February 2001, p13                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 159 calories, 7 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 22 mg cholesterol, 112 mg sodium, 23 g carbohydrate, trace fiber, 2 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, cream the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.  Beat in vanilla.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; add to the creamed mixture and mix well. Fold in nuts.
Spread into a greased 15-in.  x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool.
Place vanilla frosting in a small heavy-duty resealable plastic bag; cut an 1/8-in. hole in one corner. Pipe letters on brownies and arrange on a serving platter to form words.
